接口的使用
org.giiwa.dao.Helper.DBHelper

  • 使用Helper.DBHelper的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.giiwa.dao  

    • org.giiwa.dao中Helper.DBHelper的使用

      实现Helper.DBHelper的org.giiwa.dao中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  MongoHelper
      The MongoHelper Class is base class for all class that database access, it almost includes all methods that need for database
      all data access MUST be inherited from it
      class  RDSHelper
      The RDSHelper Class is base class for all class that database access, it almost includes all methods that need for database
      all data access MUST be inherited from it
      声明为Helper.DBHelper的org.giiwa.dao中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static Helper.DBHelper Helper.primary
      the primary database when there are multiple databases
      返回Helper.DBHelper的org.giiwa.dao中的方法

      add a custom db helper which works if primary has not that db
